original_text: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies' lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.
korean_text: 너희 남은 자가 너희의 원수들의 땅에서 자기의 죄로 말미암아 쇠잔하며 그 조상의 죄로 말미암아 그 조상 같이 쇠잔하리라

sentences.original_text: And they that are left of you
shall pine away in their iniquity
and also in the iniquities of their fathers
shall they pine away with them
